    words-check-for-words-oas3:

        severity: warn
        message: Invalid property value {{value}} -- these words are not allowed

        resolved: false

            :
            :
            :

            :
            :
            :
            :
            :
            function: pattern
                notMatch: \b(word|word|word)\b
